CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 Since the open circuit voltage V oc of BHJ PSCs is correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , 5,17 therefore a higher V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells is anticipated due to the low - lying HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. BHJ - BHJ is an abbreviation for "Bulk Heterojunction".
2. PSFDTBT - PSFDTBT is an abbreviation for "Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) / Poly(styrene-alt-4-vinylphenylene) (PVDF) / Thieno[3,4-c]pyrrole (TCP) / Thieno[3,4-c]pyridine (TCPy)".
3. HOMO - HOMO stands for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital".
4. LUMO - LUMO stands for "Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. BHJ
2. PSFDTBT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ |
| PSFDTBT |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 Since the open circuit voltage V oc of BHJ PSCs is correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , 5,17 therefore a higher V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells is anticipated due to the low - lying HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. V oc: This is the "Open Circuit Voltage" of the BHJ PSCs, which is a property of the solar cells.
2. LUMO: This stands for "Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital", which is a property of the acceptor molecule in the polymer blend.
3. HOMO: This stands for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital", which is a property of the donor molecule in the polymer blend.
4. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the polymer used in the solar cells, which is a "Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)".

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. V oc
2. LUMO
3. HOMO
4. PSFDTBT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph:

1. V oc: This is the "Open Circuit Voltage" of the BHJ PSCs, which is a Material Property that refers to the maximum voltage that a solar cell can achieve when it is in an open circuit configuration.
2. HOMO: This stands for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital", which is a Material Property that refers to the highest energy level in a molecule that is occupied by an electron.

So, the Material Property entities in the paragraph are:

1. V oc
2. HOMO

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |
| HOMO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 Since the open circuit voltage V oc of BHJ PSCs is correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , 5,17 therefore a higher V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells is anticipated due to the low - lying HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Open circuit voltage (V oc) - This is a property value that is related to the performance of the polymer solar cells.
2. LUMO energy level - This is a property value that represents the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital of the acceptor polymer.
3. HOMO energy level - This is a property value that represents the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital of the donor polymer.
4. PSFDTBT - This is a property value that represents the type of polymer used in the solar cells.
5. V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells - This is a property value that represents the open circuit voltage of the solar cells based on the type of polymer used.

In summary, the entities that represent property values in the given paragraph are:

1. V oc
2. LUMO energy level
3. HOMO energy level
4. PSFDTBT
5. V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. V oc - This is a property value that represents the open circuit voltage of the polymer solar cells.
2. HOMO energy level - This is a property value that represents the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital of the donor polymer.
3. LUMO energy level - This is a property value that represents the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital of the acceptor polymer.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties. The other entities (PSFDTBT and the phrase "based on the type of polymer used") do not refer to property values.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material property values, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| V oc |
| HOMO energy level |
| LUMO energy level |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
